match.data:
Planet Markup Language Main
1) Print Planets
2) Add PML
3) Add Planet
4) Select Planet
5) Exit
Selection:
PML:

write.data: {Planet}{ Name } Dd6RC17 { #Name} { Mass} 0.46497 { #Mass } { Period } 1.45238 { #Period } { Gravity } 1.10484 { #Gravity } { Perihelion } 2.00000 { #Perihelion } { Aphelion } 0.70000 {#Aphelion } { ERadius } 0.47368 { #ERadius } { Radius} 4.89189 { #Radius } { OrbitSpeed } 0.60326 { #OrbitSpeed } { Population } 2232 { #Population } {#Planet}\n
